explanation: In this layout, the room splits into a central reception zone, two dedicated desks on the left and right, a compact cabinet cluster (now including loose papers), and a utility nook for printing and waste.

0.description: Shared seating arranged around the counter, ideal for quick catch-ups or welcoming visitors.

1.description: A personal workstation on the left equipped with dual monitors, computer, keyboard and phone, with nearby bags and papers.

2.description: A standalone desk on the right featuring a full PC setup, keyboard, TV for presentations and nearby documents.

3.description: A tight cluster of storage cabinets, stacked boxes, and loose papers for organizing bulk supplies and documents.

4.description: A functional corner with the printer, overhead lamp and trash bins for essential support tasks.
